This jQuery plugin generates sparklines (small inline charts) directly in the browser using data supplied either inline in the HTML, or via javascript.

Flot Tracking

Flot charts can be customized easily due to its powerful API. But if you meet any troubles, you are always welcome to contact us to integrate the business l ogic into Light Blue Admin Dashboard.

Points can be marked in several ways, with circles being the built-in default.
